Title: Relates to the discharge of a mortgage
Summary: Requires a mortgagee to accept and apply payments; relates to the effectiveness thereof.
LawCode: Amd ยง275, RP L; amd ยง1921, RPAP L; amd ยง3, Chap of 2025 (as proposed in S.6363 & A.2739)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law and the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to the discharge of a mortgage; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2025 amending the real property law and the real property actions and proceedings law relating to discharge of a mortgage, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 6363 and A. 2739, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
